segments.text: What do you do in your spare time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: During the weekend I often take the family out on short trips .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it helps me to relax .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of things do you paint ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kinds of sports do you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like almost all sports , and I enjoy both playing and watching . I especially like tennis and mountain climbing . I was in the climbing club all through school .
segments.speaker: S2
